resources.string: Welcome to the World of Zombie Survival RPG.\n It\'s Like Pokemon Go, but Zombies!
Please Get to the Place You Rest Your Head Before Continue
We Need To Set Your GPS Location to Prepare Your Home Base
It Is Currently One Year After the First Signs of The Zombie Apocalypse. You have survived, just scrapping by
You have just arrived in a new town, setting up shelter in a bombed out house. It feels oddly familiar. You wish you could remember why.
Select the Continue Button Below when You Are Ready To Establish Home Base.
Press the Button To Get the Coordinates
Your home base is now secured. You now have a place to settle down in this area.
Click the Leave Home button to continute out into the world
